document_data.mainbody:
The Tome of Three Locks was a book on magic.
In the , the sorceress Dasumia commanded her apprentice Elminster Aumar to fetch the Tome of Three Locks from her side table in a well-warded room, the Blue Chamber, in her own Castle of the Lady, along with the other books Prospaer on Nameless Horrors and the Orbrum.
